en.egress_tip: allow access from internal to outside like public network or other VMs (whilte-list). Allow all by default.
en.ingress_tip: allow access from outside like public network or other VMs (white-list). TCP 22, TCP 3389 and all ICMP are set by default.
en.tip_security_name: The name is duplicated with the an one.
en.tip_info_security: Security Group is the whitelist in the virtual interface on an instance.

zh-CN.egress_tip: 是指从云主机内部访问外部（公网或者其他云主机）的白名单规则，即只允许满足以下规则的流量通过。默认允许所有协议流量通过。
zh-CN.ingress_tip: 是指从外部（公网或者其他云主机）访问云主机的白名单规则，即只允许满足以下规则的流量通过。默认允许TCP 22、TCP 3389端口和ICMP协议的流量通过。
zh-CN.tip_info_security: 安全组是云主机的虚拟网卡上行和下行流量的白名单防火墙，即在名单中的安全组规则允许流量通过。
